com.skobbler.ngx.util

Class SKLogging

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.util.SKLogging

  • public final class SKLogging
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to show logs or not. If showLogs is set to true then all logs put using with class will be seen at the console.There are three types of logs: LOG_DEBUG , LOG_WARNING , LOG_ERROR.
    Version:
    2.4

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte LOG_DEBUG
      Key for debug logs
      static byte LOG_ERROR
      Key for error logs
      static byte LOG_WARNING
      Key for warning logs

    • Method Detail

      • writeLog

        public static void writeLog(java.lang.String tag,
            java.lang.String message,
            int messageType)
        If the application is set to show logs we show logs depending on the messageType
        Parameters:
        tag - - the name of the class where the log is written
        message - - the message log
        messageType - - the type of message (LOG_DEBUG , LOG_WARNING , LOG_ERROR)
